channel.title: Port Forward Problem - John
channel.description:
Well when I run my server on a certain source I cant have more than 50 users until internet disconnections. I can't deal with restarting my router 24.7. My router is Belkin and it's not to great. I need to know alternate ways to portforward or something to host my server.
Before you kindly suggest I don't want these:
"Get a new router" "Get Linksys" "Buy dedicated"
If it deals with tons of cash nty, if its easy to get hacked then nty. Hamachi i am thinking about with a trusted firewall, -John

item.title: Port Forward Problem - John
item.dc:creator: @_J_O_H_N [-J O H N-]
